title: Identify H2 N2 O2 from Morse potential diagram

content.question: The potential energy as a function of internuclear distance for three diatomic molecules, X2, Y2, and Z2, is shown in the graph above. Based on the data in the graph, which of the following correctly identifies the diatomic molecules, X2, Y2, and Z2?

choices.label:
X2
 Y2
 Z2

H2
 N2
 O2

X2
 Y2
 Z2

H2
 O2
 N2

X2
 Y2
 Z2

N2
 O2
 H2

X2
 Y2
 Z2

O2
 H2
 N2

content.answer:
X2
 Y2
 Z2

H2
 N2
 O2

skill.text: 5.D: Identify information presented graphically to solve a problem.
